properties.entry: select sourceId, destinationId from sct2f_relationship r inner join ( select id, max(effectiveTime) effectiveTime from sct2f_relationship where effectiveTime <= cast('@sct.year@-07-31' as DATE) group by id ) rd on rd.id = r.id and rd.effectiveTime = r.effectiveTime where typeId = 116680003 and active = 1
